div.p: C.C. and S.D.S. designed the research and wrote the manuscript. R.S., K.F., B.R. and M.S. provided substantial input. C.C. and K.F. conducted the biomarker analyses. S.D.S. and M.S. provided palynological data and R.S. provided biomarker data for ODP Hole 911A. All authors contributed to the data interpretation.
